text: Villeneuve-lès-Charnod is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Jura department in east France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the commune of Aromas.Arrêté préfectoral 15 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in France Category:Communes in Jura
title: Villeneuve-lès-Charnod
